title: false permanent ban
body:
i got permanent ban i dont know how 
in email it says for using 3rd party program i travel a lot i didn't take my laptop with me i stayed for a week in the capital i opened from cyber cafe PC and played they definitely have the ip was changing i addicted to that game i spend thousand of hours i dont know or how i got banned 
so please iam tired from starting again i wanna to retrieve my acc and all my champs that spend hours and weeks to be pro and to get

replies.body: Reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can look into this for you to see precisely what happened. They'll can see why the ban was placed and should at least be provide some context as to what happened.
